concise_definition: n. 起亚（韩国汽车品牌）

definitions.explanation_en: A South Korean multinational automotive manufacturer founded in 1944, known for producing affordable and reliable vehicles such as the Sportage, Sorento, and Optima.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一家成立于1944年的韩国跨国汽车制造商，以生产价格合理、可靠性高的车型而闻名，如狮跑、索兰托和Optima。
definitions.example_en: I bought a new Kia Soul last month—it has great fuel efficiency and a modern design.
definitions.example_cn: 我上个月买了一辆全新的起亚Soul，它的燃油经济性很好，设计也很现代。
